content: [onscreen:false]Pushing yourself, you finally reach where Octavian Tidebreaker dropped anchor, though you don't see him anywhere on or near the ship...
[onscreen:false]You swim to the surface of the ship deck, surprised to find that you're able to walk with ease across the aged wooden planks...
[onscreen:false]Descending the steps below deck, you can hear the distant melody, though it sounded... different... distorted...
[onscreen:false]You carefully open the large wooden door to the Captain's Cabin. The room is mostly dark, a single ethereal blue flame dances in a lantern upon the massive desk...
[onscreen:false]You press on, feeling your heart rate speed up as the melody abruptly stopped. As if whatever was down here knew you were here...
[onscreen:true|shadow:true|zoomin:false]The gentle song of your dreams seem to fill the cabin...
[onscreen:false]There was a guttural growl. With shaky hands you unclip your dive knife, holding it in a vice and taking the last few steps into the lower decks...
[sound:avast01|emotion:neutral|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:false]As you reach out for the cabinet door, a gloved hand stops you. You can feel Captain Tidebreaker's presence at your back...
[onscreen:false] You scramble back up the stairs, your heart beating in your ears. You could have sworn something was chasing you...

[sound:annoyed03|emotion:angry|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true] Suddenly, strong arms loop around your waist, pulling you back towards the stairs. "This is nye the place fer bein brave, Abysswalker..." Octavian says in a low voice...

[sound:arr02|emotion:sad|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]You look up at him and he nods. "Aye, ye 'eard it... it be the song of the sea.. me beauty of a ship..." He frowns and his shoulders droop.
[sound:arr02|emotion:sad|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true] You collide into a solid object, rattling you in your diving suit. You look up to see a disappointed Captain Octavian...

[sound:yarr03|emotion:sad|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:false]He brings you back above deck. Almost reluctantly he releases you, taking a step back. "Since ye be so curious, I'll share with ye the truth" He frowns...
[sound:chuckle02|emotion:happy|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]He chuckles and shakes his head. "I think I should show ye the truth..."
[sound:annoyed01|emotion:sad|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]"Aye... ye found me..." He frowns and places a hand on your shoulder, directing you away from the entrance of the lower decks...
[emotion:neutral|onscreen:true|shadow:false|zoomin:true]"I think it be best I show ye the truth now, Abysswalker..."
